name: BODHost
tag_list: web-hosting, dedicated-server-hosting, cloud-server-hosting, load-balanced-servers, reseller-hosting, vps, shared-hosting
overview: bodHOST Ltd., established in the year 1999, was one of the first hosting providers in the US to offer fully-managed web hosting solutions. Innovations have always been given top priority at bodHOST offering the very best traditional and cloud hosting solutions, including bodHOST’s in-house cloud hosting platform, eNlight. The range of affordable hosting packages include shared Windows and Linux hosting, fully managed dedicated servers, fully managed virtual private servers, backup solutions and more. With eNlight Cloud having unique auto-scaling and a pay-as-you-use billing model, bodHOST’s aim is to develop innovative hosting solutions for its customers that create a buzz in the industry.
